Name: Taiko Risshiden
About the game: To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the 'Kou Shibusawa Archives' will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles. In this fifth round of releases, we offer the 1992 release of 'Taikou Risshiden.' The game revolves around the rise of Hideyoshi Toyotomi during the Warring States period of Japan. Players enjoy the story of Hideyoshi's life and his struggles as he rose from a common foot soldier to become the Chief Adviser to the Emperor.
